typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		ID as integer,
		CRM_GP as string,
		MERCADO_GP as string,
		CATEGORIA_GP as string,
		JORNADA_GP as string,
		QUADRANTE_GP as string,
		ROW_ID_TERRITORIO_GP as string,
		ROW_ID_CONTATO_GP as string,
		CICLO as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> DimQuadranteMedicoGp
source(output(
		ID as integer,
		CRM_GP as string,
		MERCADO_GP as string,
		CATEGORIA_GP as string,
		JORNADA_GP as string,
		QUADRANTE_GP as string,
		ROW_ID_TERRITORIO_GP as string,
		ROW_ID_CONTATO_GP as string,
		CICLO as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> Incremento
DimQuadranteMedicoGp, Incremento union(byName: true,
	partitionBy('roundRobin', 2))~> UnirIncremento
UnirIncremento sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	format: 'parquet',
	partitionFileNames:['dim_quadrante_medico_gp'],
	partitionBy('hash', 1),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> DestinoParquet
UnirIncremento sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	partitionFileNames:['dim_quadrante_medico.txt'],
	partitionBy('hash', 1),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> DestinoTXT
